min_sugar <- sugar %>% 
  filter(Sugars>0) %>% 
  arrange(Sugars) %>% 
  head(10) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Sugars, 
             y=reorder(Item,
                       Sugars),
             fill = Sugars)) +
  geom_col() + 
  theme_classic()+
  theme(legend.position = \none\") +

column1: position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5)) + ggtitle(\"Top 10 Menu items with the Lowest sugar Content\")
